name: Heroes Dutch Comic Con
description: Have you always wanted to meet world-famous actors and Comic Artists or are you a fan of TV series, films, esports or Cosplay? Heroes Dutch Comic Con has it all, and more! Prepare for a great weekend full of entertainment, special encounters, share your passion with others or make new friends!

name: Heroes Made in Asia
description: A celebration of Asian pop culture, with a focus on anime, manga, video games, and music. Expect special guests, panels, workshops, and a bustling marketplace.

name: Animecon
description: A convention dedicated to anime, manga, and Japanese culture. Featuring screenings, workshops, cosplay contests, and a vibrant dealer's hall.

name: Elfia Haarzuilens
description: A magical experience set in a historic castle, with a focus on fantasy, medieval times, and LARPing. Expect elaborate costumes, live music, and enchanting atmosphere.

name: Elfia Archeon
description: Another Elfia event, but with a different setting and vibe. Expect more fantasy, medieval, and LARPing fun.

name: Comic Film and Manga Fest
description: A convention celebrating comics, films, and manga. Featuring guest appearances, panels, workshops, and a vibrant marketplace.

name: NishiCon
description: A convention focused on Japanese culture, with a focus on anime, manga, video games, and music. Expect special guests, panels, workshops, and a bustling marketplace.

name: TomoFair Amsterdam
description: A convention celebrating anime, manga, and Japanese culture. Featuring screenings, workshops, cosplay contests, and a vibrant dealer's hall.

name: TomoFair Rotterdam
description: A convention celebrating anime, manga, and Japanese culture. Featuring screenings, workshops, cosplay contests, and a vibrant dealer's hall.

name: TomoCon
description: A convention dedicated to anime, manga, and Japanese culture. Featuring screenings, workshops, cosplay contests, and a vibrant dealer's hall.

name: Castlefest
description: A medieval-themed festival with a focus on music, theatre, crafts, and historical reenactment. Expect elaborate costumes, live music, and a vibrant atmosphere.

name: Viencon
description: A convention celebrating comics, games, fantasy, and science fiction. Featuring guest appearances, panels, workshops, and a vibrant marketplace.

name: Ibaricon
description: A convention dedicated to anime, manga, and Japanese culture. Featuring screenings, workshops, cosplay contests, and a vibrant dealer's hall.
